## Thirparty libraries

###
# Assimp
###
include(cmake-modules/assimp.cmake)

###
# Box2D
###
include(cmake-modules/box2d.cmake)

###
# Bullet3
###
include(cmake-modules/bullet3.cmake)

###
# Catch include
###
include(cmake-modules/catch2.cmake)

###
# freetype2
###
include(cmake-modules/freetype2.cmake)

###
# ImGui
###
include(cmake-modules/imgui.cmake)

###
# SDL2
###
include(cmake-modules/sdl2.cmake)

###
# Galogen - GL header generator
###
include(cmake-modules/galogen.cmake)

###
# STB
###
include(cmake-modules/stb.cmake)

###
# RapidJSON
###
include(cmake-modules/rapidjson.cmake)

###
# ogg
###
include(cmake-modules/ogg.cmake)

###
# Vorbis
###
include(cmake-modules/vorbis.cmake)

###
# OpenAL
###
include(cmake-modules/openal-soft.cmake)

###
# Khronos
###
include(cmake-modules/khronos.cmake)
